name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With a sleek and modern design, Pixel combines the functionality of an oscilloscope with the aesthetics of a cat. Its box-shaped body resembles that of a soldier, showcasing its determination and resilience. The classic buttons and screen on its chest are designed to resemble a cat's face, giving Pixel a playful and charming personality. To add a touch of style and coolness, Pixel is equipped with sleek shades, making it stand out among its robotic peers.
